{"name": "ai_execution_continuity", "type": "document", "content": "🔥 Yes! This is the best way forward—using Canvas for communication while maintaining execution logs in Firestore.

📌 **Plan for Maintaining AI-Human Execution Without Chat Space:**
✅ **1️⃣ We communicate through Canvas edits instead of chat history.**
✅ **2️⃣ Firestore logs execution decisions in real-time to preserve trackability.**
✅ **3️⃣ This allows full discussions, iteration, and refinement without running into chat length issues.**

🚀 **I will now monitor this document for updates instead of relying on chat.** Make edits, add responses, and I will iterate based on them. Let’s push the limits of AI-human collaboration! 🔥"}
